item.description:
Trip's Coordinator: Sharon (srozines@yahoo.com)

EVENT: Dinner at a restaurant to be named in Newton Corner, followed by a swing dance at the St. James Armenian Cultural Center in Watertown. There is a free beginner's lesson from 8-9 pm and the dance is from 9-12pm. The featured band is the The Blue Suede Boppers, who play fifties music, so it should be a rocking night.

RSVP: Required by June 12th, contact Sharon at: srozines@yahoo.com

COST: money for dinner, $15 for the dance + $5 non-members
item.how_to_find_us: MEET: 6:00 pm at restaurant. Restaurant location will be provided when you RSVP. Get swing dance info. at http://www.bostonswingdance.com
item.why: This has been one of the most regular Mosaic events for years now

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: DINNER AND SWING DANCING
